name: Paul Merriman Podcast
who_you_serve: Do-it-yourself investors of all ages seeking to improve investment returns with less risk
what_you_do: A 501(c)(3) nonprofit financial education foundation that empowers do-it-yourself investors with free academic-based research and resources for life-long investing Offers: Sound Investing Podcast, Free Books, Investment Bootcamps
offering: Sound Investing Podcast, Free Books, Investment Bootcamps, Lifetime Investment Calculator, 2 Funds for Life Calculator, Portfolio Configurator, Best-in-Class ETF Recommendations, Sound Investing Portfolios, MarketWatch Articles, AAII Articles, Videos
signature_programs: Personal Investing 216 course, multiple books including 'We're Talking Millions!' and 'Financial Fitness Forever'
current_projects: Merriman Financial Literacy Program at Western Washington University
bio: Paul Merriman is a nationally recognized authority on mutual funds and investing, author of eight books, and has a newsletter with over 44,000 subscribers. He has received the James Cloonan Award for Excellence in Investment Education and has been featured in various media outlets.
business_focus: A 501(c)(3) nonprofit financial education foundation that empowers do-it-yourself investors with free academic-based research and resources for life-long investing Offers: Sound Investing Podcast, Free Books, Investment Bootcamps
audience_type: Do-it-yourself investors of all ages seeking to improve investment returns with less risk
